price: Kemudian mereka (hamba Allah) dikembalikan kepada Allah, penguasa mereka yang sebenarnya.  Ketahuilah bahwa segala hukum (pada hari itu) kepunyaan-Nya.  Dan Dia-lah pembuat perhitungan yang paling cepat.
arabic: ثُمَّ رُدُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَوۡلَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ أَلَا لَهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمُ وَهُوَ أَسۡرَعُ ٱلۡحَٰسِبِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma ruddū ilā al-lahi mawlāhumu al-ḥaqi alā lahu al-ḥuk'mu wahuwa asraʿu al-ḥāsibīna
